20.06.19.name: wordpress/stackoverflow-profile-widget
20.06.19.description:
The Stackoverflow Profile Widget is a Wordpress widget that displays a summary of your profile on the Stackoverflow.com website. It shows your reputation, the number and kind of medals you've achieved, and a selected list of answers you have posted in StackOverflow. For each answer, it displays the question's title, the answer's score, and the time the answer was last edited.

You can limit the number of answer entries to display. You can sort the list based on score or date.

The widget uses the StackExchange API, version 2.0, in order to retrieve information.

It caches the content for a configurable period.
